work.summary: Spearheaded educational software project from design to implementation.  Achievements: Primary architect for online English teaching program with pay-gate support; developed full-text search engine for bi-lingual sentence dictionary (English and Vietnamese) using Javascript, jQuery, HTML, CSS

Developed key HR & Accountant components  including membership registration, profile management, search functionality using WebAPI, HTML5, CSS3, AngularJS, EF, LINQ, and Bootstrap •	Innovated web application design to enable employee time-tracking via WCF web service.  •	Developed comprehensive end-user and administrator interface to generate reports, send newsletters with better suggestion for user’s job search. •	Optimized system performance by periodic code reviews, and automated UI Testing using Selenium, Unit Testing and NUnit
Built UI for Change Request System with AngularJS, Bootstrap, D3, Kendo UI, bundling and minification in combination with Grunt to get the deployment in automation.

UI development of a modern workflow web application for advertising TV platform. Achievements: •	Develop Front-end engine using Typescript/AngularJS/Bower/Gulp/Karma and Bootstrap/LESS/CSS3/HTML5.  •	Develop reuseable components over projects, write automation testing using Jasmine/Phantom/Resharper. •	Develop dashboard chart component using D3, Angular-nvd3. •	Maintain and fixing bugs in fashion timely manner.

•	Develop Marketplace Avatar – a place where Xbox user buy items •	Maintain and fix bugs for Store.xbox.com where users buy games/add-ons •	Fix accessibility bugs using NVDA, WAT Used Tech: ASP.NET MVC, Ember, Ember-CLI, RequireJS, OneUI,  Bootstrap, jQuery, Sass, HTML5, Fiddler
